Text.content: Below, you see how the editor looks like in the different views when editing a bundle with descriptor.

Image.Title: The "Translate" view when editing a bundle with descriptor. In the translate view no keys can be added or removed, only the translation is editable. The visible colums can be adjusted as in the "Adjust bundle" view. Initially all non-empty columns are shown.

The "Adjust bundle" view when editing a bundle with descriptor. In the "Adjust bundle" view you edit the descriptor and the bundle at the same time. Hence, you can edited all information. The view is only available if you have write access on the bundle descriptor.
